title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 239 - Portable Fuel Container Spillage Control
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 239 - Portable Fuel Container Spillage Control

State Regulations

Subpart 239-1 - Applicability (§ 239-1.1)

Subpart 239-2 - Definitions (§ 239-2.1)

Subpart 239-3 - Performance Standards for Portable Fuel Containers and Spill-Proof Spouts (§ 239-3.1)

Subpart 239-4 - Exemptions (§ 239-4.1)

Subpart 239-5 - Innovative Products (§ 239-5.1)

Subpart 239-6 - Administrative Requirements (§ 239-6.1)

Subpart 239-7 - Variances (§ 239-7.1)

Subpart 239-8 - Test Procedures (§ 239-8.1)

Subpart 239-9 - Severability (§ 239-9.1)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 239

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§1-0101, 3-0301, 19-0103, 19-0105, 19-0301, 19-0305, 71-2103, 71-2105

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
